short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blazing fast AI copilot on any website: write emails, summarize articles, do research, fix your writing using GPT-4 or Claude Sonnet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just open the AI Blaze sidebar on any webpage to chat with AI or save even more time with shortcuts. For example:

✉️ type /email in Gmail to write a reply
📝 type /correct in any textbox to show any mistakes or typos
💼 type /edit in any textbox to make your writing more professional

And much more:

★ "AI Writer" helps you respond any email or message: you can include the email text as a part of your prompt, or let the AI detect the email automatically.

“Write a response to this email message”
“Address this customer’s complaint”

★ "AI rewriter" helps you rewrite your text: make your text professional, or shorter, or translate it to a different language. You can customize the prompt in any way you like.

“Correct any spelling or grammar mistakes”
“Make this message more professional”

★ Use dynamic prompts: include text fields, dropdown menus, date and time, system clipboard, etc. in your prompts. These versatile prompts can dynamically adjust based on your input.

“Translate this into {formmenu: Spanish; French; Chinese}”
“Make this message more {formmenu: friendlier, professional, longer, shorter}”

★ Use website data: include website data directly into your prompts. This helps the AI focus on your specific request. For example:

“Write a short LinkedIn connection request to {linkedin-firstname} who is {linkedin-headline}”
“Respond to this comment: {site: comment above your text box}”

★ Share with your team: share your prompt library with your teammates. The prompts synchronize live for all teammates whenever any member updates them.

★ Easily search your prompts: quickly search your prompts from anywhere with the AI Blaze Assistant or right click on any web page to insert a prompt from a menu.

★  Multiple models: easily switch between Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4o mini, GPT-4o (powering ChatGPT) as per your preference for speed or robustness.

★ User privacy is a top priority for us. We are SOC 2 certified.

AI Blaze is your own personalized AI agent helping you in a variety of use cases:

🤝 Customer Support: Improve response rate to customer queries on platforms like Zendesk, Freshdesk, and Intercom, by providing quick, professional, and accurate answers in line with the query raised.

👩‍💻 Social Media Managers: Write personalized and dynamic responses for each customer interaction across multiple social channels on platforms like SproutSocial, Hootsuite or Brandwatch.

📡 Social Media Marketers: Plan and execute compelling social media content on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram with AI-crafted prompts. Ideal for instant caption creations or marketing slogans.

👩‍💼 Sales Representatives: Draft persuasive responses on CRM platforms like Salesforce, Zoho CRM, and HubSpot, with a customized pitch according to the customer's previous interactions.

💼 Job Seekers: Create compelling cover letters and improve your CV quality on platforms like LinkedIn, Indeed, and Glassdoor.

✉️ Emails: Write professional responses to emails, or summarize entire threads of emails, on platforms like Gmail, Outlook.com, or Yahoo.com.
